review: I love my Firestick, however, the remote quit working within a month.  I already had the Fire TV remote app downloaded on my smart phone & just use that, as it works great.  I had purchased a longer HDMI adapter cable because of my tv at the time. I recently purchased a new tv & didn't need the long adapter. I plugged in the shorter adapter that came with the Stick & kept getting a connectivity error after that. I didn't put 2 and 2 together  (thinking my new tv had a problem) until I started reading reviews about the same problem.  I dug out the longer adapter again, replaced the short adapter & it connected perfectly!  So appears the OEM equipment has some problems & the aftermarket items (phone app remote & separate adapter cord) work best...which  is too bad.

review: I LOVE my Fire TV Stick.  The only thing i have had a problem with is at some points while watching shows, the TV freezes for about 5 seconds, but the vocals still continue while the TV is frozen.  Then, after about 5 seconds, the video speeds up and catches up the to audio.  I hope Amazon can fix this, but it's not at the point where I would want to return the item.  Overall, great item!
